MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL65 postcode area of Holyhead, affecting properties in Four Mile Bridge. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware at 12:37PM. Our engineers have arrived on site and confirmed the power cut has been caused by a broken piece of equipment. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 7:30PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:10PM on Sunday 14th February2021.
